snippet: After Russia agreed to back a compromise deal, observers will oversee operations to bring civilians out of the besieged Syrian city....

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and SOMINI SENGUPTA
byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Beirut, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations. Sewell Chan contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: After Russia agreed to back a compromise deal, observers will oversee operations to bring civilians out of the besieged Syrian city.

headline.main: U.N. Will Send Monitors to Aleppo, as Evacuations Resume
headline.print_headline: Russia Backs U.N. Vote to Send Monitors to Aleppo, as Evacuations Resume
